summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the OneFormer model's initialization, configuration, forward behavior, output formats (including attentions and hidden states), compatibility with pretrained weights, multi‑GPU data parallelism, TorchScript conversion, token embedding resizing, and training dynamics, as well as its specialized segmentation head components.
business_intent: Ensure the OneFormer model operates reliably and meets quality standards for production deployment in vision and segmentation applications, reducing risk of bugs and performance regressions.
